title: (x) Sundance Grill - modified Chascarillo {Kate}
content:
Hello,  
Please tell me if this is a font...  
And if not, what is the closest?

Thank you so much!

 ![](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907004057im_/http:/www.typophile.com/files/Sundance_6722.jpg)

 [‹ (x) Vintage Ben Hur movie screen title - hand lettered {Mike Y}](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907004057/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36432 "Go to previous forum topic") [(x) Hotel Bellwether - Trajan {Ken M} ›](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907004057/http:/www.typophile.com/node/36246 "Go to next forum topic")
author: misalion

comments.content: It looks like somebody took [Chascarillo](http://web.archive.org/web/20080907004057/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/device/chascarillo/) and messed about with it.
Is this the Sundance in Utah? If yes, then this is sad and Bob must be on vacation.

Kate, you’re right on. The cap N was used, mutilations and rotations happened, and there it is.

- Mike Yanega
